short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to look up data from Wikidata

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WOCI is a multilingual extension that enables you to search for any item or word that you come across while reading or browsing online. This extension improves the accessibility and searchability of Wikidata's data. The languages implemented are from wikidata, the user gets the data in the language selected from the structured data language available.
This extension will help its users to get Wikidata's data easily (items with their labels and descriptions). It will provide you with data from Wikidata. When installed the user can highlight a word and click on the extension to get the relevant information about that word on a popup. Each result comes with a clickable link that will send the user to the corresponding Wikidata's sitelink. The dark mode works with the operating system's mode.
An internet connection is needed to use this extension.
